articles.title: Supreme Court Seems Skeptical of Trump Colorado Ballot Ban
articles.description: During oral arguments, both conservative and liberal justices expressed concerns about allowing individual states to disqualify presidential candidates under the 14th Amendment's insurrection clause, suggesting they may overturn Colorado's decision to remove Trump from the primary ballot.

articles.title: Boeing replaces head of 737 Max program after mid-air incident
articles.description: Boeing has replaced the head of its 737 Max program as the company deals with the fallout from a door plug blowout on an Alaska Airlines flight. Ed Clark, who led the program since 2021, has left immediately, with Katie Ringgold taking over as vice president and general manager.

articles.title: King Charles III diagnosed with cancer, begins treatment
articles.description: Buckingham Palace announced that King Charles III has been diagnosed with cancer discovered during his recent prostate treatment. While the specific type wasn't disclosed, the Palace confirmed it's not prostate cancer. The King has begun regular treatments and postponed public duties.
